build openCL:

for x86:
mkdir build
cd build
cmake -D CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="../release/x86_64" ..
make
make install

for ARMHF-32:
mkdir build
cd build

cmake -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER="arm-linux-gnueabihf-g++" -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER="arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="../release/armhf_32" ..
or
cmake -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=../arm-gnueabi.toolchain.cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="../release/armhf_32" ..

make
make install
